Description.LocalizedString:
Lady Luck always seems to be throwing something good your way.
When retrieving an item from a chest, there is a {0}% chance that a Very Rare (or lower) add-on will be attached to it.
{1}% chance of finding an add-on of Uncommon rarity (or lower).
When escaping, keep any add-ons your item has.

“Everything that glitters isn’t gold. But gold isn't worth a damn in this place, so this should come in handy.” -Ace

You are fuelled by unexpected energy when on the verge of escape.

Instantly heal one health state and sprint at {0}% of your normal running speed for {1} seconds when the exit gates are powered. Adrenaline is on hold if you are disabled at the moment it should take effect and will activate when freed.

Adrenaline will wake you up if you are asleep when it triggers.

Adrenaline ignores the Exhausted status effect.

Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.

Increases your movement speed while transporting bodies by {0}%. While transporting a body, your Terror Radius is increased by {1} meters.

"At some point, the excitement of hooking one of us becomes more important than the desire to kill us."

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Each time a generator is fully repaired, Survivors within {0} meters of the completed generator will be revealed for {1} seconds.
When the last generator is fully repaired, all the Survivors' auras are revealed for {2} seconds.

Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.

Fresh blood marks are considerably more discernible than normal and can be tracked for {0} seconds longer than normal.

"Pebbles shimmering in the moonlight; my life drips down in a trail so easy to follow."

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Allies' auras are revealed to you when they are within a {0} meter range.

"We have to work as a team, I need you to survive so that I can survive!" -Dwight

You transform plants found around the campfire into tinctures that slow down bleeding.

  • Healing speed is increased by {0}%.
  • Healing item efficiency is reduced by {1}%.


    • "Basic botany knowledge could save your life someday."

Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defenses.

Destroy dropped pallets, breakable walls, and generators {0}% faster.

"It's more than muscles. A dark power motivates the beast."

Animals seem to trust you as they often stay calm in your presence.
  • Reduces chances of alerting woodland creatures by 100%.
  • Allows you to overcome the urge to scream.
  • Allows you to open chests and cleanse/bless Totems silently, but at {0}% reduced speed.

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.

Each time a generator is completed, Dark Sense activates.
While Dark Sense is active, the Killer entering a 24-meter radius around you reveals their aura for {0} seconds.
Once the aura's duration expires, Dark Sense deactivates.

"Take it from an old-timer: Slow down, don't rush and try not to worry so much! The best way to beat him is to know how he thinks." -Lost Tapes: Murf
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Reveals dying Survivors' auras when standing within a {0} meter range.

The auras of 3 generators which are in close proximity to one another are revealed to you.
Gain a {0}% repair speed bonus on the revealed generators.

Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance.

Your Terror Radius is increased by {0}%. Gain {1}% more Bloodpoints for actions in the Deviousness category.

"Bask in their fear."

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Dying or injured allies' auras are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range. Empathy does not reveal auras of allies when they are in direct contact with the Killer.

You are resilient to pain.

You reduce the duration of pallet stuns by {0}%. Has no effect while carrying a Survivor.

"He stops at nothing."

A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger.

When a Survivor is rescued from a hook at least 24 meters away, Devour Hope receives a token.
  • 2 Tokens: Gain a {0}% Haste status effect, 10 seconds after hooking a Survivor, for a duration of 10 seconds.
  • 3 Tokens: Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.
  • 5 Tokens: Grants the ability to kill Survivors by your own hand.

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

    Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.
    Haste increases Killer movement speed.

    “If you do nothing, you have their blood on your hands. If you save them, her hunger grows.“

A Hex that affects all Survivors' generator repair progress.

All generators are affected by Hex: Ruin. While a generator is not being repaired by a Survivor, it will immediately and automatically regress repair progress at {0}% of the normal regression speed.

The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

“A curse is upon you. It will be your ruin.”

A Hex that hinders one's aura reading ability.

Hitting a Survivor with a basic attack or a special attack while the Hex Totem is active applies the Blindness status effect. This effect applies to the last {0} Survivors hit.
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

“She touched your skin, you bear the witch's mark!”

A Hex rooting its power on hope. The false hope of Survivors fills you with excitement and strengthens your Totems.

For each Dull and Hex Totem remaining on the map gain a token.
  • Gain {0}% more Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter category for each token.
  • Survivors' cleansing and blessing speed is reduced by {1}% for each token.

    • The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

The growing odds of a successful escape fill you with hope and give you wings.

As soon as the exit gates are powered you gain a {0}% Haste status effect.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.

"Buckle up, fuckos! Let's roll!" -Lost Tapes: Nikki

Unlocks the stealth ability.

Standing still for {0} seconds grants you the Undetectable status effect until you move or act again.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Your powerful hold on the Survivors causes escapes to be nearly impossible.

Effects of Survivor struggling are reduced by {0}%. Time to struggle out of your grasp is increased by {1}%.

You're able to concentrate and enter a meditative-like state to numb some pain. Grunts of pain caused by injuries are reduced by {0}%. Does not function while Exhausted. Does not inflict Exhausted.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. While you are on the hook, all Survivor's auras are revealed to all other Survivors. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range, The Killer's aura is revealed to you and all other Survivors.

While a Survivor other than you is on the hook, all other Survivors’ auras are revealed to you. If The Killer is within a {0} meter range of the hooked Survivor, The Killer's aura is revealed to you.

“Be kind to one another. We’re all in this together.” -Lost Tapes: Sujan

You're able to organize a team to cooperate more efficiently. Increases other Survivors' healing, sabotage, unhooking, cleansing, opening exit gates, and chest unlocking speeds by {0}% when they are within a {1} meter range from you.
Survivors can only be affected by one Leader effect at a time.
This effect persists on other Survivors for {2} seconds after leaving the Leader's effective perk range.

Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.

You are immune to blindness caused by Flashlights, firecrackers, flashbangs, and blast mines. Survivors that attempt blinding you have their aura revealed for {0} seconds.

"These monsters… they adapt! They emerge with strange new abilities." -Vigo's Journal

Your running is light and soft, making your tracks harder to follow. Scratch marks stay visible {0} seconds less than normal, and their spacing is inconsistent.

"Take it slow, he knows where you've been… just like I've always said: live slow and die old." -Lost Tapes: Dylan

Your fervent care of the hooks found in the basement have aroused The Entity's interest.

At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

  • Scourge Hooks grant {1}% faster Entity progression if the Killer is not within 24 meters.

    • Basement hooks count as Scourge Hooks.

    "Then you will know that there is no escape. When hanging in the depths, you face the dark one."

A Hex rooting its power on hope. You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.

Once the exit gates are powered, if there is a Dull Totem remaining on the map, this Hex is applied to it.

While this Hex is active,
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect.
  • Your movement speed is increased by {0}%.

    • Once the Hex's effect is revealed to the Survivors, its Hex Totem's aura is shown to the Survivors at a range of 4 meters. This range increases steadily over the next 30 seconds to 24 meters.

    The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

    Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

    "And the beast became faster and more powerful as if The Entity's shadowy whips were lashing at its back."

It is inconceivable to leave someone behind. Once the exit gates are powered, you gain the following effects:
  • {0}% additional Bloodpoints for healing and unhooking other Survivors.
  • {1}% bonus action speed when healing and unhooking other Survivors.
  • When unhooking a Survivor, they gain a 7% movement bonus for 10 seconds.
  • The auras of all other Survivors are revealed to you.


    • "...yeah, no shit. But I believe we can outsmart and overthrow him if we work together. Don't be predictable and selfish!" -Lost Tapes: Clyde

Strengthens the potential of you and your team's aura reading abilities.
  • Increases aura reading ranges by {0} meters.
  • Survivors may only be affected by one Open-Handed effect at a time.

    • “Paying attention is what kept me alive through the years. That, and my good looks of course.” -Ace

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. The auras of unopened chests and items in the environment are revealed to you when standing within a {0} meter range. Grants a considerably better chance at finding an item of higher rarity from chests.

"The pioneers used to loot these babies for hours." -Lost Tapes: Aizeyu

PerkLevel1Description.LocalizedString:
Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.

Scratch marks left by Survivors will spawn slightly closer together.

"Never stop moving and hope you're always two steps ahead of the beast." -Notebook

PerkLevel2Description.LocalizedString:
Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.

Scratch marks left by Survivors will spawn moderately closer together.

"Never stop moving and hope you're always two steps ahead of the beast." -Notebook

PerkLevel3Description.LocalizedString:
Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.

Scratch marks left by Survivors will spawn considerably closer together.

"Never stop moving and hope you're always two steps ahead of the beast." -Notebook

Description.LocalizedString:
You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of the Killer in a 45 degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Premonition has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates.

"I have a bad feeling about this!"

For every other Survivor working on a generator within a {0} meter range, gain {1}% repair speed bonus. This same bonus is also applied to all other Survivors within range.

Survivors can only be affected by one Prove Thyself effect at a time.

"Show me what you can do!" -Dwight

You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers.

The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by {0}%.

This effect can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

You are motivated in dire situations. Grants {0}% additional speed when repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, vaulting, cleansing or blessing a Totem, opening exit gates, and unlocking while injured.

"Focus, even in these desperate times."

Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability.
  • See hook auras in a 56 meter radius from the pickup spot if another Survivor is being carried. Scourge Hooks are shown in yellow.
  • Unlocks the ability to sabotage hooks without a Toolbox.
  • Sabotaging a hook without a Toolbox takes 2.3 seconds.
  • The sabotage action has a {0} second cooldown.
Unlocks the Self Care ability, which allows you to heal without a Med-kit at {0}% normal healing speed.

You have a keen vision in the darkness of the night.

When blinded by any means, gain {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

"Shining in the darkest dark, his eyes pierce the night and sting your soul."

You have developed an efficient way to get off hooks.
  • Grants up to {0} extra escape attempts on the hook.
  • Hook escape attempts have a {1}% increased chance to succeed.

You know where to hit to make them bleed.

Wounds inflicted by basic attacks cause Survivors to suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for {0} seconds.
  • Increases the rate at which healing progression is lost from Hemorrhage by {1}%.
    • Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

    Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

    "It's in its sadistic nature. There is no swift kill as it delights in the obscene spectacle of our agonizing suffering."

You have the undeniable capability to sense danger. Get an auditory warning when looking in the direction of Totems in a 45-degree cone within a range of {0} meters. Small Game has a cooldown of {1} seconds each time it activates. For each Dull Totem and Hex Totem cleansed by any player, gain a Token. Small Game's detection cone is reduced by 5 degrees per token.

"Nope." -Lost Tapes: Andy

The crows found in the world can communicate with you directly.

{0}% of the time, cawing crows give you a visual cue when you are within a {1} meter range.
Spies From The Shadows has a cooldown of {2} seconds.

"In the shadows they torment, scarring our minds with each scream."

An unnatural tingle warns you of impending doom.
Get notified when the Killer is looking at you with a clear line of sight within a 36-meter range. Your speed while repairing, sabotaging, healing, unhooking, cleansing, blessing, opening exit gates and unlocking is increased by {0}%.
  • The effects of Spine Chill linger for 0.5 seconds after the Killer looks away or is out of range.

When starting to run, break into a sprint at {0}% of your normal running speed for a maximum of {1} seconds.
Causes the Exhausted status effect for {2} seconds.

Sprint Burst cannot be used while Exhausted.

You do not recover from the Exhausted status effect while running.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.
You perform at your best when you are under extreme stress. Great Skill Check success zones when repairing and healing get {0}% bigger when you are injured.

Whenever a generator is repaired to {0}% progress, it triggers a loud noise notification and you are granted the Undetectable status effect for the next {2} seconds. This effect can only be triggered once on each generator.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

"The Hillbilly makes impressive tools out of scraps. Tools aimed at maiming us in creative ways..." -Notebook

Your presence alone instills great fear.

Survivors within your Terror Radius have a {0}% greater chance of triggering Skill Checks when repairing or healing. Triggered Skill Checks' success zones are reduced by {1}%.

"Its presence befalls us."
You recuperate faster from missed attacks made with your main weapon. The cooldown after missed basic attacks is reduced by {0}%.

All will be well in the end; you just know it. Your confidence strengthens the feeling of hope for those around you.

For each other Survivor still alive, grant a {0}% bonus of luck to all remaining Survivors.

“What can I say? I’m just a very lucky guy… I’m sure some of it will rub off on you.” -Ace

Helping others heightens your morale.

When you rescue a Survivor from a hook, gain a {0}% speed increase while healing others for {1} seconds.

"I'm confident we can all escape in one piece if we help each other."

You have a rudimentary understanding of The Entity's voice.

Sporadically hear The Entity's whisper when standing within a {0} meter range of a Survivor.

"It's unclear as to the motivations of The Fog, but it is undeniable that it often takes the beast's side." -Notebook
